text:
[Verse]
Rain is falling down
Feet on the wet ground
Splashes all around
Joy I've finally found

[Verse 2]
Puddles under moonlight
Dancing in the night
No worries in sight
Everything feels right

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Feel the thunder reign
We're all insane

[Verse 3]
Lights of the city glow
Water starts to flow
Moments moving slow
Let your spirit show

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Wash away the pain
Feel the thunder reign
We're all insane

[Bridge]
Shadows twist and turn
Hearts begin to burn
Lessons that we learn
For happiness we yearn
title: Dancing in the Rain
